author: realbigsean
content:
Some benchmarking results (TD;DR very similar so I don't think we need to sign blobs):

2mb blobs
- Sig verification: ~11ms (1.5ms sig verify, 9.5 root calc)
- Kzg proof verification: ~12ms

500kb blobs
- Sig verification: ~4ms (1.5ms sig verify, 2.5 root calc)
- Kzg proof verification: ~5ms

256kb blobs
- Sig verification: ~2.6ms (1.5ms sig verify, 1.1 root calc)
- Kzg proof verification: ~3.8ms
